nodes.text: Cassidode VI was the location of a tiny, ill-supplied Alliance to Restore the Republic outpost during the reign of the Galactic Empire. The rebel pilot Farns Monsbee served as the base's sole snubfighter pilot before transferring to Blue Squadron on the moon Yavin 4 at some point prior to the Battle of Scarif in 0 BBY.
Cassidode IV wast first mentioned in the 2016 reference book Star Wars: Rogue One: The Ultimate Visual Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
